alert.note: Alert for Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southwest Bighorn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 22 at 1:35AM MST until November 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Northerly wind gusting 20 to 30 mph. * WHERE...Thermopolis and vicinity, Wind River Canyon, and the Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains. * WHEN...5 AM Thanksgiving through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, particularly Thanksgiving afternoon and evening, due to the combination of snow and wind. Travelers should be prepared for adverse travel conditions through Wind River Canyon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow and strongest wind is likely to occur Thanksgiving afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southwest Bighorn Basin
